description: Behaviors for managing global variables and game-wide states

global_activator.name: Global Activator
global_activator.description: An activator that triggers other logic-linked or IfUsed entities when a user-defined global variable reaches a specified value. Can be triggered by switch, zone, or range.

properties.name: ACTIVATION_STYLE
properties.description: How the activator is triggered

properties.name: ACTIVATION_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which ranged activation occurs

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of the global variable to monitor (e.g. MyGlobal)

properties.name: TRIGGER_VALUE
properties.description: Value that triggers the event

properties.name: TRIGGER_DELAY
properties.description: Delay in seconds before triggered event

properties.name: VISIBILITY
properties.description: Whether the activator object is visible

properties.name: TRIGGER_MONITOR
properties.description: How to compare global value with trigger value

properties.name: ACTIVATOR_TYPE
properties.description: Whether activator can trigger multiple times

steps: Set trigger value and monitor type

global_modifier.name: Global Modifier
global_modifier.description: Modifies a global variable when activated, with options for automatic pickup, manual pickup, or external triggering. Can also modify player health and control object visibility.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when player is in range

properties.name: COLLECTED_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when modifier is collected

properties.name: MODIFIER_LEVEL
properties.description: Amount to modify the global variable by

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which pickup is possible

properties.name: ACTIVATION_STYLE
properties.description: How the modifier is activated

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable to modify (e.g. MyGlobalModifier)

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or subtract the modifier value

properties.name: HEALTH_MODIFIER
properties.description: Amount to modify player health by

properties.name: WHEN_ACTIVATED
properties.description: What happens to the object when activated

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

global_indicator.name: Global Indicator
global_indicator.description: Displays and updates a screen image indicator based on a global value or player health. Supports up to five different indicator images with customizable thresholds.

properties.name: GLOBAL_TO_MONITOR
properties.description: What value to monitor for the indicator

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of the global variable to monitor (e.g. MyGlobal)

properties.name: SCREEN_POSITION_X
properties.description: Horizontal position of the indicator on screen

properties.name: SCREEN_POSITION_Y
properties.description: Vertical position of the indicator on screen

properties.name: SCREEN_SCALE
properties.description: Size of the indicator on screen

properties.name: FIRST_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the first indicator image

properties.name: FIRST_INDICATOR_VALUE
properties.description: Threshold value for first indicator

properties.name: SECOND_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the second indicator image

properties.name: SECOND_INDICATOR_VALUE
properties.description: Threshold value for second indicator

properties.name: THIRD_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the third indicator image

properties.name: THIRD_INDICATOR_VALUE
properties.description: Threshold value for third indicator

properties.name: FOURTH_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the fourth indicator image

properties.name: FOURTH_INDICATOR_VALUE
properties.description: Threshold value for fourth indicator

properties.name: FIFTH_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to the fifth indicator image

properties.name: FIFTH_INDICATOR_VALUE
properties.description: Threshold value for fifth indicator

steps: Choose what to monitor (health or global)

global_monitor.name: Global Monitor
global_monitor.description: Adds or deducts a value from a global variable either once or incrementally over time when activated. Can be triggered at start or by switch/zone.

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable to modify (e.g. MyGlobal)

properties.name: ADJUST_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount to add or deduct from the global variable

properties.name: TIME_INTERVAL
properties.description: Time in seconds between adjustments (0 for one-time only)

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or subtract the adjustment amount

properties.name: ACTIVATE_AT_START
properties.description: Whether to start monitoring immediately

global_affected_object.name: Global Affected Object
global_affected_object.description: A proximity-based object that affects player globals and health based on distance. Features distance-based effects, configurable ranges, timed intervals, health manipulation, and global variable integration. Perfect for creating healing zones, damage areas, buff/debuff zones, and environmental effects in games.

properties.name: IN_RANGE_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player is within the effect range

properties.name: EFFECT_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the object affects the player

properties.name: EFFECT
properties.description: Whether to add or deduct from the global variable and health

properties.name: EFFECT_MULTIPLIER
properties.description: Multiplier for the effect amount

properties.name: SECONDS
properties.description: Time interval in seconds between effect applications

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the global variable to affect (e.g., 'MyGlobal')

properties.name: HEALTH_AFFECTED
properties.description: Whether to affect player health in addition to global variable

properties.name: SpawnAtStart
properties.description: Whether the object spawns at game start or requires manual activation

steps: Configure effect range and text prompt
Set up effect type (add or deduct)
Configure effect multiplier and time interval
Set up global variable to affect

global_set_string.name: Global Set String
global_set_string.description: A simple behavior that sets a global variable to a specific string value when activated. Features one-time string assignment, global variable integration, and automatic initialization. Perfect for setting text values, messages, labels, and string-based game state in games.

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of the global variable to set (e.g., 'MyRewardText', 'MyMessage')

properties.name: NEW_STRING
properties.description: String value to assign to the global variable

steps: Create a global set string object
Configure global variable name to set
Set the new string value to assign
Verify global variable contains the new string

global_transfer.name: Global Transfer
global_transfer.description: A value transfer system that moves amounts between global variables or from globals to player health. Features automatic and manual activation, visual icon feedback, configurable transfer amounts, and health cap management. Perfect for creating resource conversion systems, health restoration mechanics, and value transfer between different game systems.

properties.name: ACTIVATION
properties.description: Whether transfer happens automatically or requires key press

properties.name: ACTIVATION_KEY
properties.description: Key to press for manual activation (only used when ACTIVATION is set to Key Press)

properties.name: TRANSFER_FROM
properties.description: Name of the global variable to transfer from (e.g., 'MyStamina', 'MyMoney')

properties.name: TRANSFER_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount to transfer from source to destination

properties.name: TRANSFER_TO
properties.description: Destination for the transferred amount

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of the global variable to transfer to (only used when TRANSFER_TO is User Global)

properties.name: ICON_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to icon image file for visual feedback

properties.name: SCREEN_POSITION_X
properties.description: X position of the icon on screen

properties.name: SCREEN_POSITION_Y
properties.description: Y position of the icon on screen

properties.name: SCREEN_SCALE
properties.description: Scale of the icon on screen

steps: Configure activation mode (automatic or key press)
Set up transfer source global variable
Set up icon image and positioning
Check health transfer and cap management
